programme.desc: Seized: Directed by Isaac Florentine. With Scott Adkins, Mario Van Peebles, James P. Bennett, Steven Elder. A former special forces agent's son is kidnapped and must now wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates, if he wants to see his son alive again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7221772/","name":"Seized","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNhMzQzNzUtNmYyYi00NDRlLWEyNjMtNWViYTQ3NzExOGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA1NDA2NTk@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012078/","name":"Scott Adkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005522/","name":"Mario Van Peebles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3068100/","name":"James P. Bennett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0282708/","name":"Isaac Florentine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0389629/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0523363/","name":"Richard Lowry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Seized","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1874051353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0M2IyNWMtZjhkMi00MDZiLTg4ZTEtMTNkNTVmYzY5MzA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0M2IyNWMtZjhkMi00MDZiLTg4ZTEtMTNkNTVmYzY5MzA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"datePublished":"2020-10-13","description":"A former special forces agent's son is kidnapped and must now wipe out three dangerous crime syndicates, if he wants to see his son alive again.","keywords":"son,revenge,kidnapping,father son relationship,crime boss","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7221772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"phanthinga"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What the hell happened to Scott Adkins and Issac Florentine ?","reviewBody":"After the lackluster Close Range back in 2015, I kinda hope that Seized would be a good comeback from the dream team of DVT action movie Scott Adkins and Issac Florentine but I guess 2020 is the year that nothing good can come out of it because this is one again a low effort action schlock from these guys and I cannot be any more disappointed in it. It definitely not the worst movie Scott has made this year because that spot still belongs to Legacy of Lies but it also far from some of his good ones. I actually really enjoyed Mario Van Peebles performance in this movie when he is the only one bring so much energy to this movie and some of the fight scenes although not as polished as Ninja 2, Undisputed 2&3 or had any fight that stands out from the rest they're still quite fun to watch, yet I can really say the same about the shallow characters and the tragic short runtime.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

It definitely not the worst movie Scott has made this year because that spot still belongs to Legacy of Lies but it also far from some of his good ones. I actually really enjoyed Mario Van Peebles performance in this movie when he is the only one bring so much energy to this movie and some of the fight scenes although not as polished as Ninja 2, Undisputed 2&3 or had any fight that stands out from the rest they're still quite fun to watch, yet I can really say the same about the shallow characters and the tragic short runtime.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"duration":"PT1H25M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Isaac Florentine

rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.","keywords":"dc comics,2010s,based on comic arrowverse","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4532368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahmetkozan"},"dateCreated":"2016-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"I can only say visually good. So-so!","reviewBody":"The pilot episode sets forth the promising tale of a motley crew destined for greatness on a romp through time and space. And, for the most part, it succeeds at continuing a trend of mostly-good DC Superhero TV on the CW. Helped along by several characters that have earned us caring about them from their development on Arrow and The Flash, Victor Garber's Martin Stein, Caity Lotz's Sarah Lance, and Brandon Routh's Ray Palmer ground the show with enough heart to kick-start it into action.

Meanwhile, Snart and Rory continue to play the well characterized pair of funny anti-heroes that we have seen again and again on the other CW shows. In particular, Captain Cold's absurdly dry sense of humor and knack for puns cuts through moments of necessary pilot exposition.

The real standout, though, is Arthur Darvill as Rip Hunter, whose sharp comedic timing and deeper acting chops should help keep the show grounded in a strong protagonist moving forward. The more Legends of Tomorrow leans on Darvill and Garber for dramatic story lines, the better.

Unfortunately, not all of the characters on the team are well-developed or well-acted. Hawkman and Hawkgirl continue to be as trite and uninteresting as they were during their stint on The Flash. And despite the potential in Vandal Savage as a character, his writing thus far has not been nuanced or compelling enough to set him on par with CW's other seasonal "Big Bads".

Moving forward, the show should succeed if it focuses on its characters and actors that elevate it above mere comic book cheese, and if it executes its promise of time-travel shenanigans in inventive, fun ways.

Legends of Tomorrow doesn't look poised to knock The Flash from its "best in DC" throne just yet. The Flash benefits from not having boring main characters (I'm looking at you Hawkman/Hawkgirl, and Arrow's terrible Laurel Lance). Consistency will be Legends of Tomorrow's biggest challenge if it wants to one-up The Flash and legitimize future expansion of CW's DC Universe. 5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":94211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

And, for the most part, it succeeds at continuing a trend of mostly-good DC Superhero TV on the CW. Helped along by several characters that have earned us caring about them from their development on Arrow and The Flash, Victor Garber's Martin Stein, Caity Lotz's Sarah Lance, and Brandon Routh's Ray Palmer ground the show with enough heart to kick-start it into action.

Meanwhile, Snart and Rory continue to play the well characterized pair of funny anti-heroes that we have seen again and again on the other CW shows. In particular, Captain Cold's absurdly dry sense of humor and knack for puns cuts through moments of necessary pilot exposition.

The real standout, though, is Arthur Darvill as Rip Hunter, whose sharp comedic timing and deeper acting chops should help keep the show grounded in a strong protagonist moving forward. The more Legends of Tomorrow leans on Darvill and Garber for dramatic story lines, the better.

Unfortunately, not all of the characters on the team are well-developed or well-acted. Hawkman and Hawkgirl continue to be as trite and uninteresting as they were during their stint on The Flash. And despite the potential in Vandal Savage as a character, his writing thus far has not been nuanced or compelling enough to set him on par with CW's other seasonal "Big Bads".

Moving forward, the show should succeed if it focuses on its characters and actors that elevate it above mere comic book cheese, and if it executes its promise of time-travel shenanigans in inventive, fun ways.

Legends of Tomorrow doesn't look poised to knock The Flash from its "best in DC" throne just yet. The Flash benefits from not having boring main characters (I'm looking at you Hawkman/Hawkgirl, and Arrow's terrible Laurel Lance). Consistency will be Legends of Tomorrow's biggest challenge if it wants to one-up The Flash and legitimize future expansion of CW's DC Universe. 5/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":94211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent=" --- Director: David Geddes, Kevin Mock, Dermott Downs, Gregory Smith, Alexandra La Roche

A few minutes in and I had to acquire an alcoholic beverage to finish it. So-so to bad acting, cheesy lines, bad jokes, plot holes bigger than a planet.

BUT! LISTEN! That is what it is SUPPOSED to be! Do not click watch to see epic sci-fi. Click watch to see beings just trying to make a living in a verse, click to see salvage operations, space ships that need repair, bars full of bar flies of all kinds, and in spite of all the cheesiness, an almost realistic grit and desperation you see in real life. I gave it a 6 because it will do, for this viewer who is addicted to all things space, until other shows come along. After the alcohol hit, it got more tolerable, even enjoyable, AS LONG AS I REALIZED WHAT TO EXPECT.

It made as much sense as Space Balls, so there's that.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1701,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Jem Garrard, Danishka Esterhazy, Natalie Haarhoff, Cindy Lee

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg pomysłowych i prostych w przygotowaniu posiłków. Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg pomysłowych i prostych w przygotowaniu posiłków. Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

programme.desc: Chocolate Road: Directed by Tanya Chuturkova. With Frances Louise Bekele, Joe Cullen Brown, Martin Christy, Elvin Ovidio Ávila Flores. Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. programme.title: Sztuczki
Sztuczki
programme.desc:
Sztuczki: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Damian Ul, Ewelina Walendziak, Tomasz Sapryk, Rafal Guzniczak. Six-year-old Stefek challenges fate. He believes that setting a chain of events in motion will help him get closer to his father who left his mother. His sister helps him bribe fate with small sacrifices. Tricks and coincidences bring his father back but things go wrong and Stefek tries a very risky trick..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1094278/","name":"Sztuczki","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4MTMyNDY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk4NTMyOQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2761542/","name":"Damian Ul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2761555/","name":"Ewelina Walendziak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764671/","name":"Tomasz Sapryk"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0235898/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"datePublished":"2007-10-26","description":"Six-year-old Stefek challenges fate. He believes that setting a chain of events in motion will help him get closer to his father who left his mother. His sister helps him bribe fate with small sacrifices. Tricks and coincidences brin","keywords":"watermelon,waitress,toy soldier,sunbathing,polish family","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1094278/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dute-1"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the truly wonderful Eastern European films","reviewBody":"One of the truly wonderful Eastern European films. "Sztuczki" beautifully captures the spirit of the small post soviet town. I found it very recognizable as I come from that kind of place myself. 

The relationship between reality of that kind of life and dream world is shown subtly and accurately in those characters. "Sztuczki" is a deep film, but the aftertaste is light and positive.

I particularly loved the casting – little boy, his sister, boy with motorcycle, mystery guy from the train platform, neighbors and ordinary passers-by – they all were poetical impersonations of the emotions people deal with in a town like that - boredom, longing, coping with everyday life, affection.

Beautiful filming, writing and acting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2016,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9026524/","name":"Bliss","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWM4MzU1NzYtYTQzOC00NTM0LTk0YTgtZWE5M2EwMzdhZWZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUxMjc1OTM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Begos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0397600/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3976308/","name":"Joe Begos"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi140295193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQyNGQzOTAtNzZhMS00MWI0LTkwYmItOTk5NDRmNjFmYmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQyNGQzOTAtNzZhMS00MWI0LTkwYmItOTk5NDRmNjFmYmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant painter facing the worst creative block of her life turns to anything she can to complete her masterpiece, spiraling into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex, and murder in the sleazy underbelly of Los Angeles."},"datePublished":"2019-09-27","description":"A brilliant painter facing the worst creative block of her life turns to anything she can to complete her masterpiece, spiraling into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex and murder in the sleazy underbelly of Los Angeles.","keywords":"female nudity,bare butt,bare breasts,female bare butt,threesome","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9026524/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vasiln"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Metal AF","reviewBody":"Look, there's not really a lot that happens in Bliss. There's a lot of setup, especially for a horror movie, and you have to wait a while for it to pay off. At times reminiscent of Starry Eyes, Bliss is three-quarters drama-- but then, aren't us horror fans always telling our judgmental friends that drama and horror aren't that different? Horror is just tragedy written all-caps.

But this isn't anything you'd call slow burn. It's not understated. It's loud. It's in your face. There's a lot of blood. There are a lot of boobs. There are a lot of bloody boobs. And there's no apology for any of that, not in Bliss-- there's exultation.

Eventually, I guess, Bliss is supernatural horror, playing around a popular enough trope, adding it's own fresh take on the (frankly tired) canon. I'd tell you more, except maybe you don't want to be spoiled. But really, it doesn't matter, not for this film. It's not about the plot, not about any kind of twist. It's about the character and the imagery.

There are a few reasons why Bliss really works. First, the lead is perfect. "Angsty," yes, but not to the point of parody. Madison takes us along for the ride in a way that few could. Second, the visuals are stunning. Part of this is filming. Part of it is editing. Most of it is just having the guts to follow the vision. If Bliss is part Starry Eyes, it's equally part Beyond the Black Rainbow: style above all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

brilliant painter facing the worst creative block of her life turns to anything she can to complete her masterpiece, spiraling into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex, and murder in the sleazy into a hallucinatory hellscape of drugs, sex and murder in the sleazy underbelly of Los Angeles.","keywords":"female nudity,bare butt,bare breasts,female bare butt,threesome","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9026524/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"vasiln","dateCreated":"2019-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Metal AF","reviewBody":"Look, there's not really a lot that happens in Bliss. There's a lot of setup, especially for a horror movie, and you have to wait a while for it to pay off. At times reminiscent of Starry Eyes, Bliss is three-quarters drama-- but then, aren't us horror fans always telling our judgmental friends that drama and horror aren't that different? Horror is just tragedy written all-caps.

But this isn't anything you'd call slow burn. It's not understated. It's loud. It's in your face. There's a lot of blood. There are a lot of boobs. There are a lot of bloody boobs. And there's no apology for any of that, not in Bliss-- there's exultation.

Eventually, I guess, Bliss is supernatural horror, playing around a popular enough trope, adding it's own fresh take on the (frankly tired) canon. I'd tell you more, except maybe you don't want to be spoiled. But really, it doesn't matter, not for this film. It's not about the plot, not about any kind of twist. It's about the character and the imagery.

There are a few reasons why Bliss really works. First, the lead is perfect. "Angsty," yes, but not to the point of parody. Madison takes us along for the ride in a way that few could. Second, the visuals are stunning. Part of this is filming. Part of it is editing. Most of it is just having the guts to follow the vision. If Bliss is part Starry Eyes, it's equally part Beyond the Black Rainbow: style above all.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"duration":"PT1H20M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Joe Begos

programme.title: Czempion
programme.desc: Marian (Marek Siudym), starzejący się mistrz kolarstwa, pracuje jako stróż na złomowisku samochodów. Przytłacza go samotne życie na odludziu. Ulega pokusie i podejmuje próbę zmiany swojej sytuacji. Okazuje się jednak, że nie jest to łatwe w nieznanym mu wirtualnym świecie, rzeczywistości selfie czy miłości na sprzedaż.

credits.actor: Marek Siudym
Michał Piela
Maria Patykiewicz

programme.title: Leszy
programme.desc: Krzysiek, po dziesięciu latach nieobecności, zabiera swojego syna na polowanie. Mężczyzna poprzez wyprawę myśliwską chce odzyskać zaufanie syna i nadrobić stracony czas. Adrenalina, alkohol i miło spędzony czas sprawiają, że mężczyźni się do siebie zbliżają. Jednak niedojrzałość Krzysztofa prowadzi doprowadza do wielkiej tragedii.

credits.actor: Tadeusz Ratuszniak
Łukasz Gawroński
Dominika Sakowicz

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Transfer kosmicznej energii
programme.desc: Radek jest ambitnym coachem motywacyjnym. Robi karierę w korporacji. Mężczyzna traci pewność siebie w momencie, gdy uczestniczy w bójce w knajpie. Decyduje się na nielegalne techniki hakowania mózgu. Niestety rezultaty są inne, niż się spodziewał.

credits.actor: Adam Turczyk
Dorota Androsz
Tomasz Więcek

programme.title: Wolne pokoje
programme.desc: Historia Zosi (Weronika Wachowska), która pod przymusem matki przyjeżdża na wakacje do starego, rodzinnego młyna, gdzie ma się nią opiekować ciotka Krysia (Olga Miłaszewska). Krewna jest dla dziewczynki niemiła, a okolica wydaje jej się przerażająca. Pewnego dnia przyjezdna wraz z nowym kolegą odkrywa tajemnicze drzwi, które są zamknięte od lat i pod żadnym pozorem nie wolno ich otwierać. Dzieci postanawiają złamać zasadę i sprawdzić, co się za nimi kryje. Obraz nakręcono w Barlinku.

credits.actor: Weronika Wachowska
Olga Miłaszewska
Filip Zalega

programme.title: Rykoszety
Rykoszety
programme.desc: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of ...

programme.title: Córka
programme.desc: W dniu szesnastych urodzin do Kamili (Gabriela Chojecka) przyjeżdża ojciec, Piotr (Adam Cywka). Niespodziewanie zastaje córkę w kałuży krwi. Dziewczyna nie chce z nim rozmawiać. Roztrzęsiony ojciec udaje się po pomoc na policję oraz do adwokata, lecz nikt nie chce mu pomóc. W końcu postanawia wszcząć prywatne śledztwo.

credits.actor: Adam Cywka

programme.title: Ale krótkie: Miłość bezwarunkowa
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu jak najdalej od smutnej, bezbarwnej miejscowości. Szybko okazuje się, że podróż autostopem nie jest tak ekscytująca, jak się wydawało, kiedy znajduje się w środku nocy na obrzeżach postkomunistycznego miasta. Dziewczyna dostrzega na moście postać, która niebezpiecznie balansuje na barierce. Tak poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Oboje postanawiają na jakiś czas obrać taki sam kierunek podróży. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji. Wkrótce między Młodą a Chudym tworzy się nienazwana więź. Całość oparta jest na płaszczyźnie psychodelicznej jak z narkotycznego transu.

programme.title: Potwory to tacy interesujący ludzie
programme.desc: Czy będąc samemu w domu czujesz się bezpiecznie? A co, jeśli ktoś Cię podgląda? Mroczny i minimalistyczny thriller, w którym reżyser bawi się formą. Opis fabuły tajemniczego projektu jest niedostępny na życzenie autora. Film zdobył wyróżnienie na Festiwalu Kina Niezależnego CK OFF w Przemyślu.

credits.actor: Ewelina Olczak
Anna Czartoryska-Niemczycka
Paweł Siwiak

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Michał Krzywicki
Kacper Anuszewski
Rafał Gerlach

programme.title: Odprawa
programme.desc: Grupa studentów wyjeżdża na wakacyjny obóz praktyk lekarskich, które otwierają ich trudną i wymagającą podróż do świata służby dla zdrowia i życia drugiego człowieka.

programme.title: Techno
programme.desc: 60-letni Ryszard (Leszek Abrahamowicz) jest rolnikiem, który żyje w izolacji od świata. Jego głównym zajęciem jest opieka nad chorą na alzheimera żoną, Joanną (Danuta Stenka). Stan kobiety coraz szybciej się pogarsza. Pewnego dnia mężczyzna poznaje młodą dziewczynę z wielkiego miasta, Sonię (Michalina Olszańska), która wprowadza go w świat muzyki techno. Dzięki temu, chociaż na krótką chwilę, Ryszard może zapomnieć o życiowych trudnościach.

credits.actor: Leszek Abrahamowicz
Danuta Stenka
Michalina Olszańska

programme.title: Kino Mówi Extra: Sport
programme.desc: Specjalne wydanie magazynu "Kino Mówi" zrealizowane z okazji Euro 2021 oraz 32. Igrzysk Olimpijskich Tokio 2021. Odcinek poświęcony jest wizerunkowi sportowców w kinie.

programme.title: Rykoszety
programme.desc: Polska, 1982 rok. Nastroje społeczne stają się coraz bardziej napięte. Dwóch braci, będących górnikami, ma odmienne zdanie dotyczące postawy, jaką należy przyjąć w obliczu komunistycznego systemu. Janek (Stanisław Linowski) angażuje się w działania podziemia na rzecz demokracji. Tadek (Tomasz Schuchardt) natomiast woli zachować neutralność. Między mężczyznami pogłębia się konflikt.

credits.actor: Zuzanna Zielińska
Tomasz Schuchardt
Marta Ścisłowicz

programme.title: Raoul Taburin
Tajemnica Raoula Taburina
programme.desc:
Raoul Taburin: Directed by Pierre Godeau. With Benoît Poelvoorde, Edouard Baer, Suzanne Clément, Victor Assié. Raoul Taburin is the story of a little boy who has grown up without knowing how to ride a bike. The story of an immense misunderstanding lived as a curse. An impostor despite himself.","keywords":"boy,based on franco belgian comic book,based on comic book","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7831674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Harfy"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raoul will bring you to boredom...","reviewBody":"Woah ! I rarely saw a so boring film. The pace is slow, so slow. The jokes are flat. The story isn't even interesting.

I never read the comics, but I think they took the best parts of it, and tried to link them together as a movie.

This one has the same problem like Boule & Bill and Gaston Lagaffe movies : the guys didn't know how to do a good script from these cartoons. And the results are plain dumb.

If you want to waste 90 minutes of your life, go with it. Otherwise, avoid it, you will be disappointed as I got myself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":676,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pension complète
Żona do podziału
programme.desc: Directed by Florent-Emilio Siri. With Franck Dubosc, Gérard Lanvin, Pascale Arbillot, Audrey Dana. François and Charlotte run together a gourmet hotel and restaurant on the edge of the sea, but their marital relationship is not fixed beauty: obsessive hard, Francis wants his first star in the Michelin Guide while Charlotte, at the dawn of the quarantine, dreams of a first child. This already complicated situation will literally explode the day where Charlotte's first husband, Alex, disembarked...

programme.title: Les confins du monde
Na krańce świata

programme.title: Carnage Park
Park makabry
programme.desc:
Carnage Park: Directed by Mickey Keating. With Ashley Bell, Pat Healy, James Landry Hébert, Michael Villar. Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Carnage Park, a remote stretch of wilderness occupied by a psychotic ex-military sniper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4335650/","name":"Carnage Park","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTA2MTQ0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkxNTAwOTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068042/","name":"Ashley Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372366/","name":"Pat Healy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2566469/","name":"James Landry Hébert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0497026/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1236514585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's 1978 and a bank robbery gone wrong leaves Vivian the hostage of two criminals on the run. But things go from bad to off-the-rails berserk when she and her captors wind up on the sun-baked desert outpost of a deranged ex-military sniper, who ensnares them in his deadly game of cat and mouse."},"datePublished":"2016-07-01","description":"Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Ca","keywords":"survival,game of death,escape,psychopath,psycho killer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4335650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"peterp-450-298716"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nutcase hiding in the desert with a sniper rifle. Sounds fascinating. The end result wasn't as fascinating.","reviewBody":""Brothers burn faster when they're burning together." 

The only positive thing about this film was Pat Healy as the crazy ex-marine Wyatt Moss, who set up his own personal amusement park somewhere in the bone-dry desert in California where he lures lost backpackers and hunts them down as a real psychotic hunter. He gratefully uses his talent as a sniper during these chases. The few times he speaks in this movie, show that he's ready for the nuthouse. Especially the dialogue with his brother, Sheriff Moss (Alan Ruck), is a memorable moment with that intonation and those facial expressions. Wyatt gave me the chills here, acting as a real psychopath. Just because of this scene, I'm planning to watch some more films with Healy playing in it.

I also thought that the sometimes eerie soundtrack and sound clips reverberating from the megaphones weren't so bad. They emphasized the insane mind of Wyatt. But otherwise this was a meaningless crime film, starring a madman fascinated by religion, who has his own safari park where victims try to survive. Thus a typical survival film. The last victim here is Vivian (Ashley Bell). She was kidnapped by two layabouts who tried to rob a bank and ended up in Carnage Park. It isn't very original and to be honest, there isn't happening that much essentially. It's during her stumbling flight that Vivian discovers other victims. And surely you can expect some fragments that are similar to those in other famous horror movies.

The thing that amazes me every time, is the stupidity of the main character. When you take matters into your own hand, make damn sure you do it thoroughly. Such a madman wouldn't get a second chance with me. But no, Wyatt with his gas mask (which reminded me of a CD cover from "Therapy?") resurfaces once again and the cat and mouse game restarts. And a cat could well have an advantage in this game, because it was largely pitch dark in this film. Several times I checked if the power went down, because in the end I couldn't see Jack sh*t most of the time. Also, the attempt to emulate the feel of a 70's movie wasn't really successful.

Actually, you can compare this with Mickey Keating's previous creation "Pod". Also, a so-called horror with potential. Good intentions are clearly present and there are also some positive aspects can be seen, but ultimately it's all vague and disappointing. Even downright violence and bloody fragments can't prevent it's becoming pretty boring and tedious halfway. Not to mention the announcement that this film is based once again on true facts. That won't make it an exciting movie, unfortunately.

More reviews here : http://bit.ly/1KIdQMT","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316272/","name":"Momentum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0MDY3MjIzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjAxNTAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001283/","name":"Louis Gossett Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566651/","name":"Grayson McCouch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780530/","name":"James Seale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102301/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007172/","name":"Deverin Karol"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Momentum (2003)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3977885721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Momentum"},"datePublished":"2003-07-26","description":"A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers.","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,fbi agent,sawed off shotgun,neck breaking,elevator","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jrgreenmd-1"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another Sci-Fi Channel Cookie Cutter Film","reviewBody":"The films of the Science Fiction Channel ( Sci-Fi Channel ) have become boringly predictable. The seem low on budget, originality, and plot.

In this creation the government is out to get a bunch of telekinetics and recruits a poor soul by devious means to help. There is plenty of over worked recycled twists on evil government organization theme. black coats, shadows, short meaningless lines make these one dimensional cartoons.

Daniel Dae Kim stands out as a good actor in a small role. He brings a bit of the style of his "Angel" character to the role. It is hard to miss the link that his "Crusade" character was a telepath and this is a film on telekinetics. Was this a Sci-Fi casting move to try and draw fans from the other show? Who knows. Thankfully he is a decent actor and a pleasure to watch.

The movie is definitely low budget. It reflects The Sci-Fi Channels current model of Canadian location, few well known characters, few effects, and woefully terrible plot and character development. One would think they believe science fiction fans will view anything labeled "scifi."

If you want a good telekinesis movie, check out "the Fury" ( 1978).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":806,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.","keywords":"b movie,robot,killer robot,die hard scenario,bare chested male","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"raegan_butcher"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gonzo Space Opera,","reviewBody":"Like Stuart Gordon's other venture into science fiction territory, the underrated and ill-fated ROBOT JOX, this is a nifty little film that was plagued by production difficulties and failed to find a theatrical distributor, which is a shame because its quite an enjoyable viewing experience. Everyone in the cast has fun in this , with Dennis Hopper delivering some unexpected and funny bits of dialog, Debi Mazar and Stephen Dorff providing reliable 2nd banana support and Charles Dance having the time of his life with his horny half-metal madman. This Excellent DVD offers a chance to see this little sleeper in a great looking print with a fascinating and funny commentary by the Director. This film delivers exactly what its titles proclaims.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6870,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Stir of Echoes: Directed by David Koepp. With Zachary David Cope, Kevin Bacon, Kathryn Erbe, Illeana Douglas. After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164181/","name":"Stir of Echoes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2NTEwZWYtYzcxYi00MzZhLTg0NDMtNTBhMTM3MjEyMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0178574/","name":"Zachary David Cope"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002062/","name":"Kathryn Erbe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014903/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558577/","name":"Richard Matheson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stir of Echoes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1653276953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAyMjM3ODEtYzA4Yi00NGM0LWI5YzctYWYwNTIxMDg5YWEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAyMjM3ODEtYzA4Yi00NGM0LWI5YzctYWYwNTIxMDg5YWEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"datePublished":"1999-09-10","description":"After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.","keywords":"hypnosis,seeing a ghost,missing person,psychic power,haunted house","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164181/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shut the door! You're letting in a draft!","reviewBody":"Tom (Kevin Bacon) has hypnotized by his sister-in-law, played by Illeana Douglas, and from then on his life's a little....well, weird. He sees a ghost of a disappeared girl, and he's not the only one - his young son's been seeing the spectre for weeks. What unfolds after that is that Tom slips further and further into imminent madness. His wife Maggie (Kathryn Erbe) can't fathom his insanity, and it's driving her up the wall, as both of the men in her life are increasingly distant and non-communicative. So what happened to Tom when he was under hypnosis? His sister-in-law claims there's a door in everyone's mind that's never been opened, and it sure looks like Tom's door is wide open, with a big neon sign over it, inviting him to run through with abandon. What's behind all of this freakiness? There's a mystery afoot, but it turns out to be a little more standard and predictable than one would hope with the solid premise. Can't fault the actors, though - this is an unusual role for Bacon, who here comes off as a tough, strong, blue-collar kind of guy - he and his family are close to what one might call white trash, but they're never portrayed as being mean-spirited or hateful. This is just one of those cases where weird stuff happens to nice folk, kind of like the clan in "Poltergeist."\n\nSo this is a stylish psychological/supernatural thriller with game performances by a capable cast. It's watchable and full of chills, but the ending's a little pat.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Van Helsing
Van Helsing
programme.desc:
Van Helsing: Directed by Stephen Sommers. With Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh, David Wenham. The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338526/","name":"Van Helsing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODRmY2NhNDItOWViNi00OTIyLTk3YjYtYzY0YTFlMDg1YzQ0L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746896/","name":"Richard Roxburgh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086885/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Roles Has Hugh Jackman Been Considered For?","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi585612825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hugh Jackman is best known for Wolverine, but he wasn't the first actor offered the role. He was, however, offered a few OTHER superhero and a super-spy roles later in his career."},"datePublished":"2004-06-09","description":"The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.","keywords":"werewolf,van helsing,dracula,vampire,creature","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rdatsun"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"It may have been corny, it may have have overused its CGI. But, hell, I loved it anyway!","reviewBody":"Yeah, I know this isn't a masterpiece of cinema and I can already tell half this nation's populace hates it despite a good run at the box office last summer. But still I went into this movie just looking for a good time (that and am a huge fan of old school monster films) and thats what I got. For the uptight and so called expert critics, let me spell it out for you: ITS A POPCORN MOVIE! OF COURSE EVERYTHING GOING TO BLOWN UP TO THE MAX AND GO OVER THE TOP! IF YOU CAN'T UNDERSTAND THIS, THEN DON'T CLAIM YOU DO AND BASH A FILM BECAUSE OF IT! *Ahem* alright on to my review.

Plot: Helsing and his assistant, a frair named Carl, are sent to Translvaynia to protect the last of a gypsy family from being stuck in purgatory due to a curse Dracula put on them. In the process however Helsing must also stop Drac's plan of engulfing the world in darkness all the while battling his minions. Throw in a plot device involving Frankenstein's monster and you have a pretty cool adventure brewing.

I'll admit for a movie that suppose to be about Helsing. They kinda dropped the ball on the story. There's way too much emphasis on the gypsy girl rather him and they don't flesh out his back story about his lost memory and his supposed history with Dracula. Also the movie has a few nonsense parts (the talk with the creepy undertaker) which kinda slows down the film a bit. But still the movie stays on a linear path and the set-ups up to confrontations are well done. Not to mention the confrontation themselves even if some are a little silly (ballroom scene (though a good homage to the Fearless Vampire Killers), the fight with the last bride, Igor and Dracula himself). Yes their CGI laden but I don't care, its a supernatural movie after all. So what better way to do them.

The actors seem very comfortable with their roles and looks to be having a great time. Extra props go out to the dude who played Frankenstien's monster, I was really feeling for him. Easily one of the best characters in the movie.

Add to that some excellent backdrops and clothes to which the film really draws you into its 19th century world. Yes the movie is full of flaws but it only for fun and only wants to entertain to which it success in spades. If you don't like it, well fine. But for all who love a good popcorn flick or a fan of old school monsters, you can look no further. Van Helsing is just the ticket for a simple good time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

minister","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2493486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yet another rendition freely based on 47 Ronin , it deals with a feudal lord : Morgan Freeman and his soldiers captained by Clive Owen .","reviewBody":"Although not mentioned , the story results to be a remake of the the 47 Ronin and and it boasts a splendid cast . it is based on the Japanese folk legend . Middle Age , an Europen country , this is an epic chronicling an ancient legend .As a group of military led by Clive Owen set out to avenge the dishonor and death of their master at the hands of a ruthless , corrupt Prime Minister, Aksel Hennie . Commanded by a fallen knight who was tricked into commiting an ominous execution , he is called Raiden ,and along with their knights rise against a nasty , sadistic ruler to avenge their Master , as every battle needs a hero . They are banished and isolated but Raiden rallies again his bunch and reforces the team . As their entire destiny lies in the hands of one knight .His threatened people made him a leader , the empire made him a renegade , history made him a hero .

Features noisy action , strong rivalry , thrills , emotion , intense drama and a lot of sword-play . It is made big scale with some breathtaking and spectacular battles such as the final assault on the impregnable fortress . The plot is ordinary and simple , as a rough emperor : Payman Maadi sentences a powerful feudal lord who is condemned to death and then his soldiers become Ronin : warriors with no master , and planning a scheme to revenge their dishonored Master , subsequently seeking vengeance , justice and honor. The appropriate photography is generously laden with views of of palaces and castles as well as paronamic vistas .The action is well paced with adequate interpretation, though the story occassionaly drags for an uneven script by Dove Sussman . It is full of good values as bravery, knighthood, honour , comradeship , sacrifice and redemption . Cast and support cast is frankly fine , such as Owen , Freeman , Aksel Hennie , Ayelet Zurer as faithfull wife , Ihara as an upright knight and Cliff Curtis as btave lieutenant .



Ii contains a colorful and evocative photography shot in Czech Republic , though sometimes dark cinematography by the great Spanish cameraman Antonio Riestra who has photographed nice films as Mama , The bachelors , Katmandu , Lidice , Black bread, Stephanie , Eloise ,and The face of love . Rousing and thrilling musical score accompanying perfectly to action from Ramgotra and Martin Tillman.The motion picture turns out to be a British/South Korea coproduction well directed by Kazuaki Kiriya who has made a few movies as Goeman and Cassehern 

This is the seventh cinematic adaptation of the 47 Ronin incident after 47 Ronin 1942by Kengi Migozuchi this is the largest version of the kabuki rendition of the story by Seika Mayama ; The loyal 47 Ronin 58 , Chushingura 62 , Ako jo danzetsu , 47 Ronin 84 , Saigo no Chushingira 2010 and the most popular retelling is 47 Ronin 2013 by Carl Rinsch with Keanu Reeves , Hiroyuki Sanada , Tanaka , Rinko Kikuchi , Cary Tagawa.And is really influenced in the Film " Ronin" 1998 by John Frankenheimer with Robert DeNiro , Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard , Jonathan Pryce .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

minister","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2493486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yet another rendition freely based on 47 Ronin , it deals with a feudal lord : Morgan Freeman and his soldiers captained by Clive Owen .","reviewBody":"Although not mentioned , the story results to be a remake of the the 47 Ronin and and it boasts a splendid cast . it is based on the Japanese folk legend . Middle Age , an Europen country , this is an epic chronicling an ancient legend .As a group of military led by Clive Owen set out to avenge the dishonor and death of their master at the hands of a ruthless , corrupt Prime Minister, Aksel Hennie . Commanded by a fallen knight who was tricked into commiting an ominous execution , he is called Raiden ,and along with their knights rise against a nasty , sadistic ruler to avenge their Master , as every battle needs a hero . They are banished and isolated but Raiden rallies again his bunch and reforces the team . As their entire destiny lies in the hands of one knight .His threatened people made him a leader , the empire made him a renegade , history made him a hero .

Features noisy action , strong rivalry , thrills , emotion , intense drama and a lot of sword-play . It is made big scale with some breathtaking and spectacular battles such as the final assault on the impregnable fortress . The plot is ordinary and simple , as a rough emperor : Payman Maadi sentences a powerful feudal lord who is condemned to death and then his soldiers become Ronin : warriors with no master , and planning a scheme to revenge their dishonored Master , subsequently seeking vengeance , justice and honor. The appropriate photography is generously laden with views of of palaces and castles as well as paronamic vistas .The action is well paced with adequate interpretation, though the story occassionaly drags for an uneven script by Dove Sussman . It is full of good values as bravery, knighthood, honour , comradeship , sacrifice and redemption . Cast and support cast is frankly fine , such as Owen , Freeman , Aksel Hennie , Ayelet Zurer as faithfull wife , Ihara as an upright knight and Cliff Curtis as btave lieutenant .



Ii contains a colorful and evocative photography shot in Czech Republic , though sometimes dark cinematography by the great Spanish cameraman Antonio Riestra who has photographed nice films as Mama , The bachelors , Katmandu , Lidice , Black bread, Stephanie , Eloise ,and The face of love . Rousing and thrilling musical score accompanying perfectly to action from Ramgotra and Martin Tillman.The motion picture turns out to be a British/South Korea coproduction well directed by Kazuaki Kiriya who has made a few movies as Goeman and Cassehern 

This is the seventh cinematic adaptation of the 47 Ronin incident after 47 Ronin 1942by Kengi Migozuchi this is the largest version of the kabuki rendition of the story by Seika Mayama ; The loyal 47 Ronin 58 , Chushingura 62 , Ako jo danzetsu , 47 Ronin 84 , Saigo no Chushingira 2010 and the most popular retelling is 47 Ronin 2013 by Carl Rinsch with Keanu Reeves , Hiroyuki Sanada , Tanaka , Rinko Kikuchi , Cary Tagawa.And is really influenced in the Film " Ronin" 1998 by John Frankenheimer with Robert DeNiro , Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard , Jonathan Pryce .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"duration":"PT1H55M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Kazuaki Kiriya

A group of lifeguards attempt to kill an atomic shark that is terrorizing the coast of San Diego." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5899100/","name":"Saltwater","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQwZDZmZTItM2Q3NC00ZmU1LTllMzYtZmE2ODZhNTdhYWYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc4ODQ5NDU@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2855957/","name":"Rachele Brooke Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001194/","name":"Jeff Fahey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004910/","name":"David Faustino"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6838943/","name":"A.B. Stone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0800303/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243206/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8309058/","name":"Scott Foy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811468/","name":"Jack Snyder"}],"datePublished":"2016-07-24","description":"A group of lifeguards attempt to kill an atomic shark that is terrorizing the coast of San Diego.","keywords":"creature feature","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5899100/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"K-let"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"B-move and hilarious","reviewBody":"I'm a big fan of Syfy and Asylum produced B-movies.

I began watching the movie accidentally and like all B-movies, once I start watching I can't turn away. Are you looking for a movie with tolerable dialog and forced interactions? Exaggerated foibles in production and plot? Atomic Shark is where it's at!

I laughed for the last 20 min: absolute excessive-ness. Subtle vocal changes for dramatic effect that don't fit the rest of the movie, jokes that drive you to google them, and Lapidis! Seriously, actor Jeff Fahey may be why I kept watching..."what's he doing in this B-movie?" 

By the end, my attitude was glee but that is only because I love these kinds of flicks.

All told, I will buy this movie. (and give them to my friends as a thoughtful gift)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":651,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Stone"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0800303/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0243206/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8309058/","name":"Scott Foy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811468/","name":"Jack Snyder"],"datePublished":"2016-07-24","description":"A group of lifeguards attempt to kill an atomic shark that is terrorizing the coast of San Diego.","keywords":"creature feature","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5899100/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"K-let","dateCreated":"2017-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"B-move and hilarious","reviewBody":"I'm a big fan of Syfy and Asylum produced B-movies.

I began watching the movie accidentally and like all B-movies, once I start watching I can't turn away. Are you looking for a movie with tolerable dialog and forced interactions? Exaggerated foibles in production and plot? Atomic Shark is where it's at!

I laughed for the last 20 min: absolute excessive-ness. Subtle vocal changes for dramatic effect that don't fit the rest of the movie, jokes that drive you to google them, and Lapidis! Seriously, actor Jeff Fahey may be why I kept watching..."what's he doing in this B-movie?" 

By the end, my attitude was glee but that is only because I love these kinds of flicks.

All told, I will buy this movie. (and give them to my friends as a thoughtful gift)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":651,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6,"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: A.B. programme.title: Van Helsing
Van Helsing
programme.desc:
Van Helsing: Directed by Stephen Sommers. With Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh, David Wenham. The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338526/","name":"Van Helsing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODRmY2NhNDItOWViNi00OTIyLTk3YjYtYzY0YTFlMDg1YzQ0L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746896/","name":"Richard Roxburgh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086885/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Roles Has Hugh Jackman Been Considered For?","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi585612825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hugh Jackman is best known for Wolverine, but he wasn't the first actor offered the role. He was, however, offered a few OTHER superhero and a super-spy roles later in his career."},"datePublished":"2004-06-09","description":"The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.","keywords":"werewolf,van helsing,dracula,vampire,creature","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rdatsun"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"It may have been corny, it may have have overused its CGI. But, hell, I loved it anyway!","reviewBody":"Yeah, I know this isn't a masterpiece of cinema and I can already tell half this nation's populace hates it despite a good run at the box office last summer. But still I went into this movie just looking for a good time (that and am a huge fan of old school monster films) and thats what I got. For the uptight and so called expert critics, let me spell it out for you: ITS A POPCORN MOVIE! OF COURSE EVERYTHING GOING TO BLOWN UP TO THE MAX AND GO OVER THE TOP! IF YOU CAN'T UNDERSTAND THIS, THEN DON'T CLAIM YOU DO AND BASH A FILM BECAUSE OF IT! *Ahem* alright on to my review.

Plot: Helsing and his assistant, a frair named Carl, are sent to Translvaynia to protect the last of a gypsy family from being stuck in purgatory due to a curse Dracula put on them. In the process however Helsing must also stop Drac's plan of engulfing the world in darkness all the while battling his minions. Throw in a plot device involving Frankenstein's monster and you have a pretty cool adventure brewing.

I'll admit for a movie that suppose to be about Helsing. They kinda dropped the ball on the story. There's way too much emphasis on the gypsy girl rather him and they don't flesh out his back story about his lost memory and his supposed history with Dracula. Also the movie has a few nonsense parts (the talk with the creepy undertaker) which kinda slows down the film a bit. But still the movie stays on a linear path and the set-ups up to confrontations are well done. Not to mention the confrontation themselves even if some are a little silly (ballroom scene (though a good homage to the Fearless Vampire Killers), the fight with the last bride, Igor and Dracula himself). Yes their CGI laden but I don't care, its a supernatural movie after all. So what better way to do them.

The actors seem very comfortable with their roles and looks to be having a great time. Extra props go out to the dude who played Frankenstien's monster, I was really feeling for him. Easily one of the best characters in the movie.

Add to that some excellent backdrops and clothes to which the film really draws you into its 19th century world. Yes the movie is full of flaws but it only for fun and only wants to entertain to which it success in spades. If you don't like it, well fine. But for all who love a good popcorn flick or a fan of old school monsters, you can look no further. Van Helsing is just the ticket for a simple good time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

minister","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2493486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yet another rendition freely based on 47 Ronin , it deals with a feudal lord : Morgan Freeman and his soldiers captained by Clive Owen .","reviewBody":"Although not mentioned , the story results to be a remake of the the 47 Ronin and and it boasts a splendid cast . it is based on the Japanese folk legend . Middle Age , an Europen country , this is an epic chronicling an ancient legend .As a group of military led by Clive Owen set out to avenge the dishonor and death of their master at the hands of a ruthless , corrupt Prime Minister, Aksel Hennie . Commanded by a fallen knight who was tricked into commiting an ominous execution , he is called Raiden ,and along with their knights rise against a nasty , sadistic ruler to avenge their Master , as every battle needs a hero . They are banished and isolated but Raiden rallies again his bunch and reforces the team . As their entire destiny lies in the hands of one knight .His threatened people made him a leader , the empire made him a renegade , history made him a hero .

Features noisy action , strong rivalry , thrills , emotion , intense drama and a lot of sword-play . It is made big scale with some breathtaking and spectacular battles such as the final assault on the impregnable fortress . The plot is ordinary and simple , as a rough emperor : Payman Maadi sentences a powerful feudal lord who is condemned to death and then his soldiers become Ronin : warriors with no master , and planning a scheme to revenge their dishonored Master , subsequently seeking vengeance , justice and honor. The appropriate photography is generously laden with views of of palaces and castles as well as paronamic vistas .The action is well paced with adequate interpretation, though the story occassionaly drags for an uneven script by Dove Sussman . It is full of good values as bravery, knighthood, honour , comradeship , sacrifice and redemption . Cast and support cast is frankly fine , such as Owen , Freeman , Aksel Hennie , Ayelet Zurer as faithfull wife , Ihara as an upright knight and Cliff Curtis as btave lieutenant .



Ii contains a colorful and evocative photography shot in Czech Republic , though sometimes dark cinematography by the great Spanish cameraman Antonio Riestra who has photographed nice films as Mama , The bachelors , Katmandu , Lidice , Black bread, Stephanie , Eloise ,and The face of love . Rousing and thrilling musical score accompanying perfectly to action from Ramgotra and Martin Tillman.The motion picture turns out to be a British/South Korea coproduction well directed by Kazuaki Kiriya who has made a few movies as Goeman and Cassehern 

This is the seventh cinematic adaptation of the 47 Ronin incident after 47 Ronin 1942by Kengi Migozuchi this is the largest version of the kabuki rendition of the story by Seika Mayama ; The loyal 47 Ronin 58 , Chushingura 62 , Ako jo danzetsu , 47 Ronin 84 , Saigo no Chushingira 2010 and the most popular retelling is 47 Ronin 2013 by Carl Rinsch with Keanu Reeves , Hiroyuki Sanada , Tanaka , Rinko Kikuchi , Cary Tagawa.And is really influenced in the Film " Ronin" 1998 by John Frankenheimer with Robert DeNiro , Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard , Jonathan Pryce .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

This is the seventh cinematic adaptation of the 47 Ronin incident after 47 Ronin 1942by Kengi Migozuchi this is the largest version of the kabuki rendition of the story by Seika Mayama ; The loyal 47 Ronin 58 , Chushingura 62 , Ako jo danzetsu , 47 Ronin 84 , Saigo no Chushingira 2010 and the most popular retelling is 47 Ronin 2013 by Carl Rinsch with Keanu Reeves , Hiroyuki Sanada , Tanaka , Rinko Kikuchi , Cary Tagawa.And is really influenced in the Film " Ronin" 1998 by John Frankenheimer with Robert DeNiro , Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard , Jonathan Pryce .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"duration":"PT1H55M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Kazuaki Kiriya

meaningful true story","reviewBody":"Aside from the current 6.9 rating, I hope it gets much higher rating, the story itself is already amazing, there is depth in this story, bring the viewer's view of find that the actor, the story, the lightning and the dramatic moment is well composed and serves its purpose.After finished watching it, it strengthen my point of views, everything serve a purpose but, there must be a beneficial meaning behind it which lead us to eternal success, i think most of us tends to give up because reality make us live in fear, but it is because life is about suffering Godzilla

The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120685/","name":"Godzilla","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFlOTI2OGQtMzg0YS00ZGE4LTkwMjEtZDUzYThlOTU5YjQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000111/","name":"Matthew Broderick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001623/","name":"Maria Pitillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053780/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0195567/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002041/","name":"Dean Devlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Godzilla (1998)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3970236697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "May 20""},"datePublished":"1998-05-20","description":"French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.","keywords":"giant monster,iguana,military,giant footprint,running for your life","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonymurphylee"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"I thought this was fun. I don't know why people whine about it so much.","reviewBody":"Well, being a longtime fan of the GODZILLA/GOJIRA films as a youngster, I remember seeing this with great anticipation. I, unlike a lot of people, was not at all disappointed. This film was exactly what I was hoping it would be at the time. Sure, it certainly wasn't as charming or as funny as the films I loved as a kid, but it was a lot of fun. I loved the action scenes, the look of the monster was crazy to me, and the plot was simple enough for a first time viewer to get right into. Seeing it again 10 years later, I had the same reaction. My opinion of this film hasn't changed one bit. I guess everybody's complaints stem from how this has no charm or any kind of attempt at being cute or original. I guess that's understandable, but I still don't see what everybody's problem is. This was supposed to be a fun, exciting, and action packed thrill ride. That's all it is, no more, no less. I personally think that it succeeds at what it achieved to be perfectly. Matthew Broderick may not exactly be an action hero, but his character sure was quirky and funny. Jean Reno was as good as usual."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185982,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

meaningful true story","reviewBody":"Aside from the current 6.9 rating, I hope it gets much higher rating, the story itself is already amazing, there is depth in this story, bring the viewer's view of how a women become an outstanding musician conductor and characteristic itself is very reasoned. yeah, maybe there might be some subtle scene there can be improved, but i couldn't find any, i just find that the actor, the story, the lightning and the dramatic moment is well composed and serves its purpose.After finished watching it, it strengthen my point of views, everything serve a purpose but, there must be a beneficial meaning behind it which lead us to eternal success, i think most of us tends to give up because reality make us live in fear, but it is because life is about suffering so why not try to enjoy it and live in a meaningful ways of Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","keywords":"copaganda,shared universe,spinoff,punctuation in title,male protagonist","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"luke_rock"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Took a while....","reviewBody":"It took a while to get me interested in this series. Having been a long-time NCIS fan, I felt obligated to give it a fair shake. After the first few episodes, I felt bored and wondering if I should keep watching. Maybe it was because I was preoccupied when NCIS: LA would air. However, after settling down and focusing on the episodes, mainly the one where Dom gets kidnapped, I felt like they've hit their stride. There's no doubt this is a completely different show than the original NCIS. That's what makes it tolerable. They're not trying to copycat the other like the CSIs did in my opinion. They've got humor. They've got crimes they're trying to solve. They've slowly gotten some chemistry. Keep in mind, Shane Brennan is running both shows and he has yet to disappoint me on the original. They're in good hands and hopefully, they'll get even better. The first NCIS had a few bumps in the road during the first season and hit their stride in Season 2.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49421,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7}}</script><metacontent="
